text.page:
443
099-222a @##/ /rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod/ /mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba'i ngang / /nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar/ /srog gi sgo ru shar ba dang / /snying gi sgo ru bsgom par bya/ /snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni/ /gsad cing gnan pa ma yin te/ /phung po rdo rje gtams byas nas/ /rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom/ /o~M badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+hAn ba~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ rdo rje gzhon nu rig 'dzin rnams/ /srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig /srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha/ /ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku/ /ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las/ /'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa/ /sku yi dbyig tu bdag gyur cig /thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du/ /byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba/ /sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas/ /

444
099-222b dbang dang byin brlabs 'dir gsol cig /o~M badzra kro d+ha hU~M kA ra hU~M/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po hU~M kA ra dang / yum rdo rje sgra 'byin ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma phag gi mgo can dang / smigs bu'i mgo can no/ /o~M badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hU~M/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang / yum rdo rje rnam snyems ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma stag gi mgo can dang / bya rgod kyi mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hU~M/ da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngon po dang / yum rdo rje sder mo/ sprul pa'i phra men ma g.yag gi mgo can dang / bya rog gi mgo can no/ /o~M badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU~M/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed po dang / yum dur khrod kyi bdag mo/ sprul pa'i phra men ma sha ba'i mgo can dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po mi g.yo mgon po dang / yum rdo rje gtun khung ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma gzig gi mgo can dang / khwa'i mgo can no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hU~M/ hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang / yum rdo rje gtum mo/ sprul pa'i phra men ma byi la'i mgo can dang / pu shud kyi mgo can no/ /o~M badzra kro d+ha a pa rA dzi ta hU~M/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po dpal ldan gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / yum rdo rje mda' snyems ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma spyang ki'i mgo can dang / khra'i mgo can no/ /o~M badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha phaT/ khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / yum rdo rje rlung 'byin ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma seng ge'i mgo can dang / pha wang gi mgo can no/ /o~M badzra kro d+ha tre+e lo kya bi dza ya hU~M/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / yum rdo rje gsod byed ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma dred kyi mgo can dang / zer mo'i mgo can no/ /o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ khro bo stobs po che dang / yum rdo rje bskyod byed ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma dred kyi mgo can dang / byi ba'i mgo can la sogs pa rnams kyis gtams pa'o// //

445
099-223a srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang / /dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir/ /ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol/ /khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang / /rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang / /kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol/ /dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab/ /sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab/ /phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab/ /shwa na mu kha'i dus la bab/ /bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la bab/ /khyed kyi phrin las dus la bab/ /sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab/ /mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la bab/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing / /dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa/ /rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni/ /gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs/ /bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams/ /khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas/ /mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang / / lus ngag rdul du bshig nas kyang / /sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mjod/ /o~M la~M hU~M laM/ sta~M b+ha ya nan/ mo ha ga ya b+ha ga bAn/ shi kri bi kri/ shrI badzra hU~M kA ra hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ dzaHhU~M pa~M hoH/ sarba big+h+nAn/ o~M badzra kI li kI la ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ badzra hUM kA ra hU~M phaT/ hU~M kA ra hU~M aH/ dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs/ /gdug cing sdang sems byed pa rnams/ /zung shig rgyob cig rnam par chings/ /gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis/ /rings par khug la smrar chug cig /phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis/ / nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang / /bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis/ /hU~M pa ra bi d+h+wan hU~M phaT/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phaT/ ha sa ya/ ra na ha ta na hU~M phaT/ shri krin a na ya hU~M phaT/ dz+wa lA pa ya dz+wa lA pa ya hU~M phaT/ A be sha ya A be sha ya hU~M phaT/ bid+d+ha ya bin+d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs/ /khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab/ /sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa'i/ /mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod/ /ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/

446
099-223b ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ ka tang+ka te ya/ dza ye bi dza ye ya/ a dzi te a pa rA dzi ta ya/ ma ra se+e n+ya~M pra marda nA ya hU~M phaT/ rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni/ /sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa/ /stobs chen khro bo chen po yis/ / klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos/ /nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs/ /nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed/ /hU~M ma ma ba shi ku ru/ ma tha ma/ ny+ya ka ra/ i nan dasti/ ma ma karma shri krang ka re ya/ gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi/ /lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung / /nga la bar chad byed pa rnams/ /mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byos/ /sarba A na ya hU~M phaT/ tad thA ya tad thA ya hU~M phaT/ brdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun/ /bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams/ /rdo rje me dbal snying sregs nas/ /lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlogs/ /khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du/ /rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas/ /lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya/ /kha tha ma/ kha tha ma/ kha tha ma/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA hi/ khA hi/ kha hi/ hi hi hi/ ha ha ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ chos nyid kyi bden pa'o/ /gsang sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o/ /a b+hi tsAr+ya'i dus la bab pa'i brnag pa de kho na la'o/ /kI li kI la ya nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ bcwa brgya da/ dkar nag gi mtshams su'o/ /hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ tsam bzlas so/ /rdzogs s+ho// //
